title: Looking for clash peps, gold. Add me
body: gold team, need top and adc :)

replies.body:
Looking for clash team to join, Silver 2. Just looking to have some fun and get some w's. Ex-Adc main, willing to play any role, pref JG or ADC. Hardly played ranked this season so dont judge based on that xD. Looking for banter. Add me and send me a message if interested.
Summoner name: Crawlinginmyskin
hey man im willing to join for adc :)
